this game is still relevant goddamnit...

the good thing is the developer still working hard for this game, you can see this in many different update they apply for the past few month like dangerzone update and adding mp5 to the game. i hope in the future they added more updates and features in the game, especially for VAC System, i still seeing spinbot etc in prime matchmaking even tough i already reported the player still dont get banned (but i do know they ban one people because my report of spin botting). and PLEASE PRETTY PLEASE explain how ranking system work, i have been playing for like almost 2 years yet i still don't pass the silver rank, i have 8 winstreak and got a rank silver elite, seems normal... but when i enter the competitive match making and lose 2 match i immediately lose my silver elite rank (this happen a lot with me and my friends), valve pls fix this overall i think this game is worth playing its fun and you can do some sick shot. thanks for reading my review, i mean no harm, THANKS. (Sorry for the bad english)
